resources.string: Please select the mode of shutdown
Finish setting time, you could click the icon to cancel.
System will shutdown at once without saving your work.
"Your machine hasn\'t got root permission and this application needs it."

ShutdownNow! 
Let us set the time when you want to shutdown. 
Click the clock button to set time then choose shutdown mode. 
BTW, you can cancel setting by clicking delete button. 
 
By.Fython 2014 (fython@163.com) 
Github Code: http://github.com/fython/ShutdownNow
